version_description:
1. Release a new Outfit
* Players can obtain the outfit from the outfit shop 

2. Gem Recast
* Many players have given feedback about the gem exchange system. For a better gaming experience, we have added to the recast system. Now the player can exchange spiritnites and transfer cards to recast the gems. 

3. Magic horn optimization
* Optimization for the current selection for the magic horn: Players can now obtain the information easily.

English Version Notice


Dear Fighters!
1. New type of outfit!
In order to meet the needs of fighters to dress up in order to show their personality, for now, we have added new outfits for Wizard and Pet. Wing costumes will be added in the future.

2. Phoenix Rectrix optimization
 Phoenix Rectrix being a rare item and to prevent players from identifying normally, now it can only Ex-Identified.

3. New service event adjustment
Events are adjusted so that new fighters can cope up easily in the game.

4. Explore optimization
Fixed the red dot bug in the game.

5. Gym optimization
 Due to the feedback collected, we have decided to make a slight adjustment to the gym:
(1) The employment coach adds reasonable restrictions: the middle and senior coaches add the corresponding VIP limit and copy limit, and can reach the VIP limit or the copy limit to unlock one of the conditions.
 (2) The first level bracket for the ultimate gym is adjusted from levels 31-50.
